1.description: First, create the blade, which will serve as the primary cutting edge of the object, giving it its essential functionality. The blade should be positioned centrally to ensure balance and control, setting the foundation for the subsequent components that will enhance its usability and structure.

2.description: Finally, attach the handle to the base of the blade, ensuring it is securely fastened to provide a comfortable grip for the user. This addition is crucial as it not only completes the knife's structure but also enhances usability and control, allowing for precise handling during use.
